title: Elephant Candelabrum Vase (Vase à Tête d'Eléphant)
artistDisplayName:
Sèvres Porcelain Manufactory (French, founded 1740)
Design attributed to Jean-Claude Duplessis (French, c. 1695–1774)
Painted by Pierre-Louis-Philippe Armand (French, active 1758–1781)
medium: Soft-paste porcelain, polychrome enamels, and gilding
creditLine: Art Institute of Chicago. Joseph Maier and Arthur Lewis Liebman Memorial: Gift of Kenneth J. Maier, M.D.
